title: NAB gets more seven day custody of Imran Khan, Bushra Bibi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 22 (APP): An Accountability Court (AC) on Monday granted the National Accountability Bureau (NAB) a further seven-day physical remand of PTI founder Imran Khan and Bushra Bibi in new toshakhana case.
The two accused were produced before the Accountability Court at Adiala Jail after their eight day remand was ended. During the hearing, the NAB prayed the court to grant further 14 days physical remand of the accused for more investigation from them in the said case. The NAB also presented the progress report regarding investigation to the court.
After hearing the arguments, the court granted seven days of physical remand of the accused and ordered NAB to produce them again on July 29.
